website_summaries.verdict: This multiple award-winning playhouse is easy to assemble, sturdily designed, and absolutely adorable, making it an excellent place to curl up and read.
cons: Its floor mat could be a bit more cushioned

customer_reviews.title: Precious teepee!
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice, large teepee. Fabric is thick and seems durable. The sewn in bottom is a big plus over some other brands with no bottom. My granddaughter seems to love getting in her own play space, where the velcro tabs give her "privacy". Only complaint from my son was the assembly directions were a little vague. Still a great item. The owners of the comapny were also amazing. I messed up the order and they worked with me to solve all issues with great patience. A++
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she loves it! Shipping was super fast (1 day even with 2 day shipping) and the product is very well made. I had some issues setting it up not cause it was hard but lack of sleep and lack of coffee will do that to you. It is very spacious! Both my daughter and I fit in it along with 10 stuffed animals, 5 pillows and a partridge in a pear tree. It’s fun to play in or even sleep in. I have had a sleep deprived mom nap in there a few times. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SH0486

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend this to anyone and everyone with kids! I thought it might be too small but it’s actually quite large which was a nice surprise. My daughter just turned 9 and is 4’9” and weighs about 65lbs she fit in it comfortably and so did I and I’m 5’5” and 118lbs and we still had room. I just recommend you buy a pillow base or carpet or something for the floor inside the tent no padding to lay on other than that a high 5 👍
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love how sturdy and beautiful this teepe is! It was exactly what I was looking for, I have two children 5 years old and 10 months old and they both fit with a lot of room left and love playing in it. It’s perfect for the oldest’s room as is very pretty looking too and the material you can tell are the best quality!!
customer_reviews.author: David Brecka

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Excellent Customer Service!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute product! My girls (4yo and 20 months) have enjoyed this so much! Tent will hold 4 preschoolers comfortably. We had a small issue with the leg breaking. Emailed customer service and they sent out a replacement leg and a spare the next day. Great company! Thanks again! :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Albonetti

customer_reviews.title: Great for photos, looks, playtime and functionality! Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for sending me the moon and the arrow with my tent, it was perfect for our birthday shoot, easy to put together, easy to move and it's going to last us a long time for play as well. We absolutely love it, highly recommended for looks and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Vampira's advice

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!! Was easy to put together except directions aren’t super clear on the rope at the top as well as the two balls on a bolt to help keep the poles spaced properly. Overall so cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Cute but the pictures make it look higher quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but fabric was wrinkled and takes away from look I think it’s impossible to put back in bag to store it, isn’t that the point you can store it when not using it? The bag should be much bigger and storage bag should be darker pink to hide dirt For the price the fabric should be heavier the floor keeps wrinkling up😞
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter loved this. I ran some battery operated twinkle lights around the top and inside the tent and she lays on her pillows and reads her books in her own private retreat. It’s super sturdy. I also put a pink rug on the floor inside and it’s so cozy and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: We love this Teepee
customer_reviews.text: My five-year-old daughter loves TP. We have it in our living room and it doesn’t feel cluttered, it goes pretty well with our open space design. I had no idea that my daughter will decide to do her violin practice inside Teepee this morning :) . Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana

customer_reviews.title: Best tent around for your kids
customer_reviews.text: We are loving our teepee tent! It was so easy to assemble with durable poles and material that my rough and tough kids love playing in. It was so easy that I was able to do it myself! My littlest loves going in there and hiding her toys while my oldest goes in to read his books. It also can be taken down easily and stored for future use! Highly recommend this tent!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: This teepee is absolutely adorable! It’s big enough for all 3 of my kids to play in together, and was super easy to put together. The design makes it easy to pick up and move it easily without having to take it apart like others we’ve had!
customer_reviews.author: Kelci Oser

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great size
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and easy to put together! Just received this in the mail today and my daughter has spent the entire afternoon in it! It is big enough for my husband, daughter, 2 small dogs, and me to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rose

customer_reviews.title: My 3yo loves her teepee
customer_reviews.text: She loves it. It’s super cute. It’s as described. But best of all when one of the poles got broken the customer service was EXCELLENT. I got an email response same day and the new pole was shipped the next day at no cost to me. Customer service and accessibility are things that matter to me so I definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The installation was pretty easy. The tent is sturdy, good material and spacious for my 2 kids to play. They love it so much that they even take turn to sleep in there and pretend that they are camping! Definitely recommend to everyone else.
customer_reviews.author: MBA L.

customer_reviews.title: Cuteness and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Super super cute! My 7yo loves playing in here with the flaps closed. Her friend and her have tea parties in her and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the tent for my 15 month old. She loved it from day 1. The material is not a cheap one and the tent is so sturdy. I firmly believe that it will last until my next kids. Thanks Hippococo for creating such a great product! Would definitely recommend it to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Anh nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It’s such a big and pretty teepee! My girls love to read books in theirs!
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: So pretty in my daughters room and she likes sitting in it. It’s so adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Karlie

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious...easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it!!!!! Bought it for my 8 year old who also loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Nice teepee; it takes up a bit of small but yet is kinda of small inside. It does not come with a sewn mat as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelz

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. Purchased for my 8 year old granddaughter who assembled it herself!!
customer_reviews.author: Gwenann

customer_reviews.title: Difficult instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions difficult to comprehend. Once you get past it the tee pee is fun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute teepee
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute! My 1 and 3 year old love it and are having fun playing in it. It was easy to put together and came with a link to watch the assembly instructions video.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Nice size Teepee
customer_reviews.text: I like it! I think it’s the cutest thing for my almost 1 year old baby girl. Only thing is when setting it up, it’s kind of difficult getting the legs to stay put. I figured that if you twist the legs a bit, it stays put. Bigger than I expected, which is good as my daughter only likes it if I’m in there with her lol
customer_reviews.author: Yanna23

customer_reviews.title: Love this teepee!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, beautiful colour and very spacious for my two little girls. They love it and we added little fairly light decorations which makes it look extra cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Furmie

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces/busted silicone bags
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters birthday today 12/31 opened it up and missing the pole connectors and rope so cannot put it together. No instructions either AND the silicone bead preserve packs were busted everywhere!! What the heck?! HORRIBLE delivery of product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: So cute ! Watch the video for set up.
customer_reviews.text: Written instructions are hard to follow. Me and my friend watched the video how to and it was much easier and I know it is put together exactly as should be.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love this teepee. We sit in it and read books together. I also purchased the lights and it just takes the teepee to the next level!
customer_reviews.author: Fanny E Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tent
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to assemble and much larger than I had imagined, but ultimately a beautiful product. Bought for my 5 year old and she loves it. Perfect place for her to curl up with a book and relax or play.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly for 2 kids
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and stable material, beautiful pink color, my daughter loves it. Nice decoration for her room as well!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved this.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my granddaughter for her birthday as a reading nook. It was a big success!
customer_reviews.author: Kim J

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cute
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters love it!! It is super cute.. The girls love hanging out in it ..
customer_reviews.author: Arlene A Wandasan

customer_reviews.title: It's challenging to get the Teepee to fully expand.
customer_reviews.text: Not able to get the base to fully expand in all directions. You move one pole out and another moves in. However, it does look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had a lot of fun putting this together for our toddler daughter, it's beautiful, it's safe, this is a great buy or gift to give!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Only had for 2 months and is falling apart and discoloring!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hippococo Teepee Tent for Kids: Large Sturdy Quality 5 Poles Play House Foldable Indoor Outdoor Tipi Tents, True White Canvas, Floor Mat, Pink Heart Accessory, Family Fun Crafts eBook Included (Pink)
feature_bullets: UNIQUE INDOOR OUTDOOR PLAYHOUSE FUN - Unlike other teepee tents that fall over, break and rip easily, Hippococo kids teepee tent is durable, extra safe, tall and spacious with a 5 wooden poles pentagon shape. Imagine having a playhouse that would give you peace of mind while your little ones have countless hours of fun and creative play. Ideal for escapade like reading, coloring or even napping. Set up and dismantle just like a charm for camping or family trips. Perfect for outdoor shading.

FUN MEETS DESIGN & QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP - Hippococo passion for quality can easily be perceived within this well thought tipi design. Made of heavy, soft, durable, breathable, non-toxic, unpainted, extra safe cotton canvas with double stitched seams throughout and durable wood poles. We like to be different, this is why our Indian teepee comes with a floor mat sewed to the canvas, a moon or heart accessory as well as a unique reinforcing part to keep it solid and open.

ASSEMBLY INSTRUCTION VIDEO & IDEAL GIFT - Enjoy bonding time with your youngsters crafting one or all 5 family fun projects to complement your teepee given to you as a bonus; from a flameless fire pit, Indian totem treasure, to a dream catcher, be sure to see priceless expression on your child or grandchild’s face when they complete their projects. We also made available an easy to follow assembly instruction video. Our teepee is the ultimate gift for any birthday or presents.

COMPLETE SATISFACTION & RISK-FREE GUARANTEE - Hippococo offer a RISK-FREE GUARANTEE. We excel in making the best products and we are confident that you will love your teepee but if you are not absolutely happy, we will REPLACE OR REFUND YOUR ORDER, no questions asked. Our warranty protects you for any defects or damage. Hippococo offers complete customer service to always guarantee your satisfaction. CONTACT US directly and we will take care of you. WE LOVE TO HELP.

OUR MISSION - Hippococo thrives to help families make their everyday life safe, healthy and fun. We like to offer the finest quality product to your household so you can enjoy freely the little pleasure of life. Our teepees are designed in FL, USA. There is no better way to decorate your child bedroom affordably and make them happy all at once! Give your child now their very own personal space to create, play, read and nap! Hippococo, your children perfect indoor outdoor best value play tent!
